recipes.couchbase::default: Install couchbase server and sets up default attributes

couchbase/package.description: couchbase .deb server package to be installed

couchbase/package_url.description: Http Url to download package from

long_description:
Description
===========
    This cookbooks downloads Couchbase server package from an Amazon S3 bucket ,installs and  configures it.
    It contains recipes the  enable the server join a cluster , leave a cluster and add dns setup.
